title: Katie Price slams 'little boy' Charles Drury after his cocaine binge claims
text:

Katie Price has hit back at her toyboy ex Charles Drury after he claimed she'd go on cocaine binges and text married men.

The former glamour model, 41, has branded the builder, 22, a "little boy" after he made sensational claims about their relationship.

Charles, 22, said they'd slept together hours after they first met after taking cocaine while she was still with her on/off boyfriend Kris Boyson, 30.

He also claimed she'd not sleep for days on end after binging the drug, which Katie's reps denied.

And Katie has now said she knew he would sell a story on her and is "over it".

(Image: Facebook)

He rep told us: "Kate is not angry with Charles. Given what she now knows about him it was inevitable he would sell a story to try to publicise himself.

"Kris and Kate are over Charles who is behaving like the little boy he is."

Katie previously admitted to taking cocaine weekly for six months as she struggled to cope with her mum's terminal illness and ex husband Kieran's cheating.

(Image: Instagram)

She had checked into rehab and was treated for trauma and depression.

Charles rated her a 1/10 in bed, and said they would sleep in the annex of her mucky mansion because the main house is currently "unlivable".

He believes she cheated on him during their fling, but she would never admit to it.

(Image: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

Their relationship came to an end when Charles saw pictures of her leaving Kris' house.

A spokesperson for Katie said: "There is no truth in the allegation that she is taking drugs every day and has made significant steps to being drug free - there have been lapses in the past but they are just that, not a regular event.

"Katie is still in recovery and making progress."
description: Katie, 41, has now said she knew Charles, 22, would sell a story on her and is 'over it' as she moves on with Kris Boyson
